skill.name: behaviors.skills.primitives.Heal
skill.description:
For an agent to know how to heal a set of 'Wounded' units.
When several units should be healed, the agent acts on each one by following the order of the elements into the 'woundedUnits' list.
Wounded units won't be healed if it could not be reached (it has moved away or it is localized in a non accessible urban block).

parameter.name: woundedUnits
parameter.description: The set of 'wounded' units to heal.

link.name: reach
link.description: To reach the crowds to heal.

feedback.name: healed
feedback.description: Sent each time an entity has been healed.

argument.name: woundedUnit
argument.description: The "transportable" entity that has been loaded.

feedback.name: notHealed
feedback.description: Sent each time a "transportableEntity" cannot be loaded.

argument.name: woundedUnit
argument.description: The entity that cannot be loaded.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent when all "woundedUnits" have been visited. Even if one of them haven't be healed.

feedback.name: failed
feedback.description: Sent if the set of "woundedUnits" is empty (no element to act on).
